flags.name: --confirm
flags.validation: Must be set to true to proceed.

permissions: Allowed for users who can update the related project (ProjectPolicy update? via delegated policy).
side_effects: Deletes the project estimate set and its dependent estimates (revenue item and phase estimates, phase dates estimates).
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. --confirm is required. Deletion is blocked if other estimate sets reference this one as a backup estimate set.
